title: Professional Team For Tournaments/rank Ect. As A Job
body:
Hi guys/girls I want to start a serious team that has the same mind set and same life style or situation as me.
I want to make a serious team for tournaments and ranking and more if possible in future should lol get bigger in oceania.
I am looking for people who are over 17+ and do not have a full time job and is not studying full time or anything else.
i am looking for people who play league 10+ games or 10+ hours a day and 5-6 days a week 
I am looking for plats or higher ranked 
I am looking for a people who main 1-2 roles only unless you can actually main that many roles and are equally good in each one.
I am looking for people who play to win every single game they play and always treat every game seriously 
I am NOT! looking for casual players or players who say shit like i only play for fun or to make friends and specially not people who say shit like 
^ ( I'm feeding but its okay cause that person will carry ) 

You must carry every single game or try your best to carry I do not want scrubs 
And last of all respect your team member or you will be kicked out

Must have a gaming computer and headset' skype or whatever is required 


If you're interested let me know IGN: Fairy Law or reply here and ill check up on it every few days

replies.body: Dam that ticked all the boxes for me last year apart from plat xD  sadly  all the boxes have crosses this year,  where were you last year man when i needed you
